column2: [junit5] Support FileSource and CompositeTestSource in 'Jump to Source'

column3:
Currently Intellij only extracts locationHints from MethodSource and ClassSource.
In cucumber there is a feature file (FileSource) as well as a step implementation (MethodSource) you may want to navigate to from the test tree.
I report both of them in a CompositeTestSource in this order [FileSource, MethodSource].
This pull request adds support for:
I already send a signed CLA for a previous pull request to intellij-plugins.
Looks good. Will merge manually tomorrow. Thanks!
Thx, looking forward to the next release.
support FileSource and CompositeTestSource in 'Jump to Source'
